abstract: Laser pointers are commonly used by ushers at theaters and concert halls in China to dissuade audience members from using cellphones during performances; some performers appreciate practice, while others find it disruptive.
lead_paragraph: Some performance spaces in China aim light beams at patrons to discourage them from using cellphones during shows.

headline.main: A New Weapon for Battling Cellphones in Theaters: Laser Beams
headline.print_headline: Cellphone Use in the Theater? Laser Shame on You
